## What Is OpenClaw?
OpenClaw is an open-source, MIT-licensed platform for building personal AI agents. It runs on your own hardware (Mac, Linux, VPS) and connects to messaging apps: WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Slack, Signal, iMessage. Key features:
- SOUL.md: Define agent personality via markdown
- Persistent memory: Daily logs + curated long-term memory
- Multi-channel: One agent across 6 messaging platforms
- Model agnostic: Works with OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, DeepSeek, local models
- Tools: Web search, browser automation, file ops, shell commands, cron jobs
- Self-hosted: Your data on your hardware
